title: Stop That Cat!
subtle: Humorous (fiction), 40 words, Level B (Grade K), Lexile BR20L
description: Cat is excited about going outside. He zooms past many things. It seems like nothing can stop that cat! High-frequency words, repetitive sentences, and whimsical illustrations support early emergent readers. Students can also learn about classifying information and adjectives while reading the story.
meta: door, fence, nap, past, yard, zooms
Initial Consonants : Discriminate initial consonant /y/ sound
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use the high-frequency word the

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
